charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1101_0100_2:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking
through the forest one day, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] stumbled upon
Burgh chatting excitedly with another Trainer.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_0200_1:
And just look at that incredible patterning on its
antennae! I feel like it’s staring straight into
my soul!
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_0401_0400_1:
Ooh! Look who fluttered by for a visit!
I didn’t expect to run into you today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_0302_0500_1: You seem to be enjoying yourself.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_0402_0600_1:
Ooh! Look who fluttered by for a visit!
I didn’t expect to run into you today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_0700_1:
This fellow here is actually a fan of mine!
When he called out to me from the trees earlier,
I noticed that he had a Bug Pokémon with him.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_0800_1:
Turns out he’s been buzzing for me to take a
look at his partner!
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_0900_1:
How could I say no to that? Getting to closely
observe such cute Pokémon is probably just as
fun for me as it is for them.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_0301_1000_1: Did it give you some inspiration?
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_0401_1100_1:
Oh, absolutely! I got to observe a Beautifly a
minute ago that had the most adorably shaped
mouth I’ve seen in a long time.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_0402_1300_1:
Oh, absolutely! The Beautifly I looked at a minute
ago had the most adorably shaped proboscis I’ve
seen in a long time.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_1400_1:
It had an elegant but cute little curl to it...like
a swirl. I reached out to see what it would feel
like and...
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_4700_1: PLINK! Jabbed me right in the hand.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_1500_1:
Ahaha! Maybe it thought I was trying to taunt it
somehow. Who knows? It was obviously bugged
by my presence.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_1600_1:
Anyway, it was an interesting experience to say
the least! Even the painful part.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_1700_1:
Just don’t go getting any ideas, all right? Even
Beautifly can be dangerous if angered, and I
don’t want you getting hurt.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_1800_1:
That reminds me... At some point, I met a Trainer
here on Pasio who had a Spinarak for a partner.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_1900_1:
For whatever reason, I decided to have a staring
contest with the pattern on its back. I thought it
would be fun to see who cracked a smile first.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_2000_1:
Did you know that Spinarak can change their
patterns depending on their mood?
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_2100_1:
Well, when I won the staring contest, this one’s
back pattern went from a smiley face to a
sad face.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_0301_2200_1: How do you know all of this stuff?!
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_0401_2300_1:
Because I looove Bug Pokémon! Every time I
discover something new about them, I just want
to learn more!
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_0302_2400_1: I don’t know if I would have noticed!
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_0402_2500_1:
Really? Oh! I know! Why don’t you try observing
some Bug Pokémon with me now? I can give you
some pointers!
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_2800_1:
Yes! Right there! Come out from your hiding spot,
little one!
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_2900_1:
Ooh! I know you! Aren’t you the Spinarak I had a
staring contest with before?
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_3000_1:
I wonder if it came looking for me, hoping we
could play another round.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_0301_3100_1: How did you know it was there?
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_0401_3200_1: It was actually Leavanny that noticed it.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_0402_3400_1: Well, it was actually Leavanny that noticed it.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_3500_1:
Leavanny are incredibly nurturing Pokémon
by nature.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_3600_1:
When mine finds small Pokémon, he likes to weave
clothing for them from leaves using the sticky silk
he secretes from his mouth.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_3700_1:
So when I saw him start to fidget, I knew there
must be a little one around here somewhere.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_0401_3900_1:
Hehe! Well, when it comes to my beloved partner,
I’m just extra attentive.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_0302_4000_1: You really know your bugs, Burgh!
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_0402_4100_1:
Hehe! Well, when it comes to my beloved partner,
I’m just extra attentive.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_4200_1:
When you’re really close to a Pokémon, you start
to understand what it’s thinking by the way it
moves or by the way its cries sound.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_4300_1:
No matter how much I observe other people’s
Bug Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_4400_1:
Leavanny will always be the most adorable
Pokémon in my eyes.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_4500_1:
Now, then! Why don’t we go and find this little
Spinarak’s Trainer? I’m sure he’s around
here somewhere.
charaepi_ch0170_00_arty/2301_1201_4600_1: Come on! Let’s do it together!
